item.description:
Master The Law of Attraction with 
Spiritual Self-Hypnosis

5 Consecutive Thursdays 
December 1, 8, 15, 22, 29
6:30 – 8:00 p.m. 
(1st class 6:30 – 8:30 p.m.)
in our Northampton Office at
39 Main St., 3rd floor

Your Certified Instructor: Deborah Yaffee, CH

Clear obstacles to manifestation using a unique method of spiritually based meditative hypnosis. 

Use this "antivirus software of the mind" for stress management, motivation, 
self-esteem, overcoming unwanted habits, relationship problems and more. 

Tuition includes course-book, 
practice CD and access to an online community of practitioners.

Since space is limited - 
pre-registration is required 
(by November 25th)
You may either pay for the 5 session series through PayPal at the website
OR
Take the first class FREE OF CHARGE 
to try it out,BUT YOU MUST REGISTER IN ADVANCE. 

PRE REGISTER at http://www.LiberationAstrology.com/events.htm
item.name: Master the Law of Attraction with Spiritual Self Hypnosis
